title: Mandate
description: A Mandate enables an entity (user, service) to act in a certain Role in a service connected to a Realm. A Mandate is issued to a public key, and may only be used by that key.

label.description: The human readable name for the mandate (the role)

ttl.description: Seconds until expiration after the document was created (timestamp)

recipient.description: Identifier of the receipient of the mandate

recipientName.description: Name of the receipient of the mandate

recipientPublicKey.description: The public JWK of the recipient of the fact

requestId.description: The id of the mandate request

sender.description: The id of the sender of the invite

params.description: Additional parameters for the mandate, used by actions
